
{{alias}}( [out,] re, im, n )
    Rounds a complex number to the nearest multiple of `10^n`.

    When operating on floating-point numbers in bases other than `2`, rounding
    to specified digits can be inexact.

    Parameters
    ----------
    out: Array|TypedArray|Object (optional)
        Output array.

    re: number
        Real component.

    im: number
        Imaginary component.

    n: integer
        Integer power of 10.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array|TypedArray|Object
        Real and imaginary components.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 5.555, -3.336, -2 )
    [ 5.56, -3.34 ]

    // Provide an output array:
    > out = new {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}( 2 );
    > var v = {{alias}}( out, 5.555, -3.336, -2 )
    <Float64Array>[ 5.56, -3.34 ]
    > var bool = ( v === out )
    true

    See Also
    --------
